# Privacy Policy

Curved Nebula respects your privacy.

We do not collect, store or share your personal information.

However our apps use Google Admob service (https://admob.google.com (opens new window)) that may use your approximate device location. This information allows ad providers to deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you.
